Description:
I N A KT/180322/01
You have failed to provide suitable welfare facilities on site because you have failed to provide rest facilities,a toilet or provide hand washing facilities with a source of clean running hot and cold, or warm, water even though it would be reasonably practicable to do so.
INAKT/180322/02
Insufficient health and safety management training has been given to your site manager to ensure that he has sufficient knowledge of relevant legislation to be able to plan, manage, co-ordinate and monitor the health and safety of site work.
